data.text:
https://bafybeid5mzxoyeqweruhzyakovyddzetakx2hogkpv4hrs2u5ghrjuke5u.ipfs.dweb.link/?filename=20220331_9_Zvernennya_Eng_Sub_TG.mp4&filetype=video%2Fmp4

# 我们忍受的程度远远超过了敌人的预期。他们说--三或五天。他们认为这足以让他们夺取我们整个州。而现在已经是36天了。而我们还在坚持。而且我们将继续战斗。

> We endured much more than the enemy expected. They said - three or five days. They thought that this would be enough for them to seize our entire state. And it’s already 36. And we are standing. And we will continue to fight.

[Source](t.me/V_Zelenskiy_official/1049)
#泽连斯基
